utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, you guys! Guess what? Barry and Mindy are getting a divorce!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What is the matter with you?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! Barry and Mindy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh sorry, I hear divorce I immediately go to Ross. Who-who’s Barry and Mindy?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Barry was the guy that I was almost married and Mindy was my best friend.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohh-oh, wasn’t he cheating on you with her?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, but that just means that he was falling asleep on top of her instead of me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why did they get divorced?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, apparently she caught him cheating on her with someone else. Isn’t that sad? God, could you imagine if I actually married him?! I mean how different would my life be?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know what you mean, I’ve always wondered how different my life would be if-if I’d never gotten divorced.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Which time?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The first time! No seriously, imagine if Carol hadn’t realized she was a lesbian.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can’t. I keep seeing it the good way.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’d bet I’d still be doing my kara-tay. Towards the end of our marriage I was doing a lot of kara-tay as a way of releasing the tension from y’know, not doing anything else physical.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Maybe the problem was you were pronouncing it kara-tay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And what if I was still fat? Well, you wouldn’t be dating me, that’s for sure.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure I would!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh yeah! Come on! Yeah right!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What, you guys really think that I’m that shallow?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I just think Monica was that fat.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, imagine if I never got fired off Days Of Our Lives! Oh-hey, there’s Carol again!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What if I had had the guts to quit my job? I’d probably be writing for the New Yorker, getting paid to be funny. But my job’s fun too! I mean tomorrow, I-I don’t have to wear a tie.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What if I had taken that job at Merrill Lynch?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Merrill Lynch?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I had a massage client who worked there and-and he said I had a knack for stocks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well why didn’t you take the job?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because at that time you see, I thought everything that rhymed was true. So I thought y’know that if I’d work with stocks, I’d have to live in a box, and only eat lox, and have a pet fox.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, do you guys think that if all those things happened, we’d still hang out?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! Rachel Green?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Rob Tillman!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no. It’s-it’s me, Ross!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I’m sorry. Ross Tillman.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no-no, Ross Geller.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, of course Monica’s brother!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! How are you?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good-good, I’m-I’m married.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! Me too!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is-isn’t it the best?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, it’s the best! So, umm how’s Monica?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh really, really great! Yeah! A-actually she’s right down the street, umm, do-do you know what? You should stop bye and say hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, I would love too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? Oh-oh, she’d be so excited!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! Okay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh wait, don’t you have to pay for your, Busty Ladies?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, it’s okay. Some-some kid asked me to pick it up for him, but I don’t…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But! Don’t you have to give him his money back?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-huh. Hey, here you go buddy. Sorry, no porn for you. Okay, let’s go see Monica!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So Monica, still going out with Dr. Boring huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He’s not boring! He’s just-he’s just low key.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh dear God, let me think.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no! What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh I just got another rejection letter. They said my writing was funny, just not "Archie Comic funny."

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Was his question what’s more boring than him?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey man, look sorry about that Archie thing. Do uh, do you need me to give you some money?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, I may have no money, but I still have my pride.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ehh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Maybe Joey doesn’t have to give you the money, TV stars have assistants right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s an idea! Hey, if I hired an assistant, would-would you take money from her?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No Joey! Chandler could be your assistant! See, he could answer all of your fan mail and stuff!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s great! That would be great! Let’s do that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I could use the money; it could give me time to write.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh right great! Welcome aboard!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! Now hey, I need to use the bathroom. Since I don’t need any assistance in there, take a break!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Phoebe! Guess what?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey just hired Chandler to be his assistant!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh that’s so sweet! Oh! Hang on! Hang onnnnnn!!! Go!! No! No-no! I said sell when it hits 50! 5-0, it’s a number! It comes after 4-9!! No, it’s okay. It’s okay, you’re allowed one mistake. Just kidding, you are of course fired.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Mon!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mon, look who I ran into!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Rachel!! You look terrific!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, so do you! Did you lose weight?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You are so sweet to notice! Yes, I lost three and a half pounds!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And, and uh, you-you remember my friend Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And that’s Phoebe over there!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, sit down! Sit down! How long as it been since we’ve seen each other?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 1987, the day after Christmas, at Sean McMahon’s party. I played you one of my songs, y’know Interplanetary Courtship Ritual.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah. Right. So now, are—do you, do you still do music?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sometimes, you should come over sometime! I’ll play you one of my other…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Joey Tribbiani from Days of Our Lives, just walked in here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach, he’s a friend of ours.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You are friends with Dr. Drake Remoray?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well it’s kinda hard to be friends with Drake because of his busy schedule and the fact that he’s not real.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey-hey, or I could bring my keyboard over here sometime!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: He’s coming over! He’s coming over!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know, here-here!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohhh! No! This is my friend Rachel, we went to High School together.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! I love you on that show! I watch you everyday! I mean, when you took out your own kidney to save your ex-wife even though she tired to kill you…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, it’s always nice to meet the fans.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She’s not crazy is she?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So uh, how you doin’?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hang on! Hang on! Hang on! Go!! Who’s this? Oh okay, you’re gonna like working for me. What’s your name? What kind of name is Brendy? I… Whatever… Stop talking! All right, from now on your name is Joan. You can pick your own last name.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey there you are!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-oh, it’s my boss!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, here’s a list of things for you to do today. Man, this going to be so great! Thank you so much! All right, I got to go to work I’m delivering twins today, but only one of them is mine!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Drop off my dry cleaning. Pick up my vitamins. Teach me how to spell vitamins. Wear in my new jeans.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You realize what you are don’t you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’re his bitch.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No-no!! No!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh wait! You didn’t just sit on my Kit-Kats did you?!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! There-there was a little, a little diff in the market and I lost 13 million dollars.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But the Kit-Kats are all right?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What am I gonna do?! What am I gonna do?! I can’t call my office they’ll kill me! I can’t call my clients they’ll kill themselves! Great, now my chest hearts.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: My chest hurts! Oh, and now I-I can’t breathe.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe, are you having a heart attack?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, if I were, would-would I have shooting pains up and down my left arm?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Then yes that is what I’m having.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on Pheebs, it’s not that bad! Y’know most people would be excited if they didn’t have to work for a couple of weeks.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Most people don’t like their jobs, I love my job! I have not been working for three hours and I’m already going crazy. I miss Joan.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, having a heart attack is nature’s way of telling you to slow it down.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I always thought having a heart attack was nature’s way of telling you to die! But you’re not gonna die. I mean, you are going to die, but you’re not gonna die today. I wish I was dead.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Let’s take a walk. Y’know maybe you should consider writing for Talking Out of Your Ass magazine!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So what’s going on with you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well umm, I’ve been doing a lot more of my kara-tay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Still going through that dry spell with Carol?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How long has it been since you had sex?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, last weekend…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh that’s not so bad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: …will be two months…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That is.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: …since I stopped trying.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe you need to spice things up a little.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What-what do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t know. You could tie her up, she could tie you up; you could eat stuff off each other…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know, dirty talk, ménage à trois, toys…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Roll playing… You could be the warden; she could be the prisoner. You could be the pirate; she could be the wench!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I think I got it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Or too, you could be two stockbrokers and you’re-you’re-you’re rolling around naked on the trading floor and everybody’s watching! It never happened.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sorry. So how’s it going with Joey?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh just great. He beeps me now with codes. One is, "Bring me food." Two is, "I’m with a girl, bring us food." Three is, "I’m lost and I can’t find food."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Is uh, is she gonna be all right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! She’s right in there!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh great. Hey! Go take off those pants, they look ready!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, and over there is Brady’s Pub where I like to unwind after a long day of surgeoning.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! This is so amazing! What else? What else?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, that is a large piece of television equipment. And uh that is an old man! Hey old man!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All righty, what do you say we head back to my place?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! Umm, y’know, I-I would really love to, but I-I shouldn’t.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why? Why can’t the world stop turning, just for a moment? Just for us?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Isn’t that a line from the show?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, yeah but uh, I may have said those things before but, I never truly meant them. Until now.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s a line from the show too!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, you watch too much TV.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here you go Joe, here’s the freshly squeezed orange juice you asked for.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks! Yeah, there’s pulp in that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I thought we talked about this. I don’t like pulp. No pulp. Pulp isn’t juice. All juice, okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m sorry, I guess I just like the pulp.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God, I’m sorry, I’m being so rude. Rachel, would like a soda or something? Because Chandler would run right out and get it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah sure, iced tea would be great.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Iced tea.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, anything for you sir?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Did I not just tell him?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, you did.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay look, Chandler, if this you have got to listen! You’re gonna throw that juice at me, aren’t ya?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s not all juice!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So honey, this morning was fun, huh? Me hopping in on you in the shower there.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Yeah! And maybe someday we could get a place with two bathrooms.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look Carol umm, I was, I was thinking maybe uh, maybe we can spice things up a little.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Carol our sex life is—it’s just not working…

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Dad!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey there little fella! Hey, uh-hey, why don’t we get some shoes on ya, huh? Hey, why don’t you show dad how you can put your shoes on, in your room! Yay!!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Yay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yay! Seriously, our sex life… I was thinking, maybe I don’t know, we could try some-some new things. Y’know? For fun?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Like what?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well I don’t know umm, what if we were too tie each other up? Umm, some people eat stuff off one another. Nah! Umm, y’know we-we could try dirty talk? Umm, we could, we could have a threesome.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: I love that idea!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who sold a story to Archie Comics?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! That’s great! Oh wow! You’re a published writer! I wish I had a present for you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aww.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute! My last Kit-Kat bar!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You wanna share it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Hey Chandler look, I know you’re mad, but I just want to say I’m sorry. I-I was a total jerk. Completely o-over the line. Uh, I just I hate pulp! Y’know? I mean, y’know how Monica feels about low fat mayonnaise?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s not mayonnaise!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, o-o-o-o-okay anyway, I just wanted to say I’m sorry. Here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What’s this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fresh squeezed orange juice, with pulp! Just the way you like it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aww, thanks man.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Joey, Chandler sold a story to Archie Comics!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God! That’s great! Congratulations! What’s the story?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh you wouldn’t uh, care. It’s just a stupid comic book story.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you kidding me?! I love Archie! And the whole gang!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well uh, Archie needs money to fix his jalopy , uh but he doesn’t want Reggie to just give him the money. So Reggie hires him as his assist—as his butler. And then makes him do all these crazy things like bring him milkshakes that can’t have lumps in them.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wait a minute. That sounds a little familiar! Did they already do that one? ‘Cause I think I read it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Mon, listen I have to ask! Okay, Joey Tribbiani invited me back to his apartment, now does he do this with a lot of girls?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, a lot. A lot, a lot!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! And I’m one of them!! Wow! Oh, I just cannot believe this! I mean, Joey Tribbiani!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, y’know it’s none of my business, but aren’t you married?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Oh I just wish we could not be married for a little bit! Y’know I just wish we could be like on a break!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, you’re not.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, it’s so easy for you I mean, you’re not married, you get to have sex with who ever you want!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah I can! And don’t think I don’t, because I do! I mean all the time, you betcha!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica. You’ve, you’ve done it right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Of course I have! What do you think, I’m some 30 year old virgin?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! You’re a 30 year old virgin!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Say it louder, I don’t think the guy all the way in the back heard you!

utterance.speaker: Guy All the Way in the Back
utterance.content: Yeah, I heard it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s not like, I haven’t any opportunities. I mean, y’know, I’m just waiting for the perfect guy. I’m seeing this guy Roger, all right? He’s not perfect, but umm, I think maybe I should just get it over with. Y’know, give him my flower.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!! Do it!! Honey, you’ve waited long enough!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know what? You are right?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes!! I mean sex does not have to be a big deal! There shouldn’t be all this rules and restrictions! Y’know, people should be able to sleep with who ever they want, whenever…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel! I’m never gonna think it’s okay for you to cheat on your husband!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh what do you know? Virgin!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, why is smoke coming out of the bathroom?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah, the doctor said that could be one of the side effects.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe! Put that cigarette out!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! It’s not a cigarette! The smoke is coming out of me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Put it out!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! I’m so glad you’re here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on. I got it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, give it to me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I got it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Give it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello? No she can’t come to the phone right now. Oh, right no problem. Okay, bye-bye.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Was it my work? Were they mad? Was it Jack? Did he yell?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: J-j-just relax, nobody yelled. Jack just was calling to make sure that you were getting better.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, she’s fired.

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: You’ve done all you can Dr. Wesley. You have got to let her go.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Wesley
utterance.content: Good-bye and God speed, Hope Brady.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Drake Remoray
utterance.content: Not so fast Wesley!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Wesley
utterance.content: Remoray!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Drake Remoray
utterance.content: That’s right Wesley! I just stopped by to say that, you’re not a real doctor! And that woman’s brain, is fine!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Thank God!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Drake Remoray
utterance.content: Hope! Hope!

utterance.speaker: Hope
utterance.content: Drake!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Drake Remoray
utterance.content: You’re not dying Hope, you’re gonna live a long, healthy life. With me.

utterance.speaker: Hope
utterance.content: Oh Drake.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay! Here we go! Okay! Hi, Joey! It’s Rachel! Umm, I am free tomorrow night. Yeah, sure, sure I can bring some sandwiches.
